name: wxDict
short_description: wxDict is a Cross-Platform and Multi-Language dictionary written in C++ by the aid of wxWidgets,it supports Windows,Linux/X11,Mac OSX platform,its features contain pluggable dictionary databases,pattern matching search,fuzzy search,full text translation
